questions:
What is the main focus of the photo?
A) A group of people
B) A large sculpture
C) A landscape
D) A building

What is in the center of the photo?
A) A tree
B) A painting
C) A sculpture
D) A person

What is the shape of the object in the center?
A) Spherical
B) Cylindrical
C) Rectangular
D) Triangular

What is the color of the sculpture?
A) Brightly colored
B) Dark
C) White
D) Transparent

What is in the background of the photo?
A) A busy street
B) A forest
C) A plain wall
D) A crowd of people

What is in the foreground of the photo?
A) A body of water
B) Grass and trees
C) The floor and part of the sculpture
D) A table with objects

What kind of environment is the sculpture placed in?
A) Outdoor
B) Indoor
C) Underwater
D) Underground

How many blocks make up the sculpture?
A) One
B) Two
C) Three
D) Four

What is the lighting like in the photo?
A) Dark and shadowy
B) Bright and well-lit
C) Dim and moody
D) Colorful and vibrant

What kind of art style does the sculpture represent?
A) Realistic
B) Abstract
C) Impressionistic
D) Surrealistic

What is the likely material of the floor in the photo?
A) Carpet
B) Wood
C) Concrete or polished stone
D) Grass

Are there any visible signs or labels in the photo?
A) Yes
B) No

What kind of lighting is used in the environment?
A) Natural sunlight
B) Artificial indoor lighting
C) Candlelight
D) Neon lights

What is the likely era of the sculpture's creation?
A) Ancient
B) Medieval
C) Modern
D) Futuristic

What is the color of the central object?
A) Blue
B) Red
C) Black
D) Green

What is the texture of the central object?
A) Smooth and shiny
B) Rough and rusty
C) Soft and fluffy
D) Wet and slippery

How many blocks make up the central object?
A) One
B) Two
C) Three
D) Four
